title: Harry Potter and philosophy Stone
description: We grew up with this fantasy novel and from the age of 11 we feverishly checked our mail for a Hogwarts invitation. Who was lucky enough to get one?

title: Vincent van Gogh
description: Vincent van Gogh (1853–1890) is one of the most famous 19th century artists in the world. He was born in Holland but spent most of his life in Paris. His style of painting fits most prominently among the Fauvists or Expressionists – he was also one of the founders of Expressionism, which was just emerging at the time.
